languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on an ally, that ally gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} equal to {uip|StatBonus|27b71e5bb62a4bf1ad94359f49ca5f52}. These bonuses stack, but half of the stacks (rounded up) are lost at the end of the target's turn.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицер{/g} применяет {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, делая целью союзника, союзник получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}, равные {uip|StatBonus|27b71e5bb62a4bf1ad94359f49ca5f52}. Эффект суммируется, но половина прибавки (с округлением вверх) пропадает по завершении хода цели.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Leader uses an ability on an ally, that ally gains a bonus to their Perception and Ballistic Skill equal to <u>(Leader's FEL bonus)</u>. These bonuses stack, but half of the stacks (rounded up) are lost at the end of the target's turn.

Whenever the Leader uses an ability on an ally, that ally gains a bonus to their Perception and Ballistic Skill equal to <u>Leader's FEL bonus</u>. These bonuses stack, but half of the stacks (rounded up) are lost at the end of the target's turn.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on an ally, that ally gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} equal to {uip|StatBonus|27b71e5bb62a4bf1ad94359f49ca5f52}. These bonuses stack, but half of the stacks (rounded up) are lost at the end of the target's turn.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on an ally, that ally gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} equal to {uip|StatBonus|27b71e5bb62a4bf1ad94359f49ca5f52}. These bonuses stack, but half of the stacks (rounded up) are lost at the end of the target's turn.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on an ally, that ally gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} equal to {uip|StatBonus|27b71e5bb62a4bf1ad94359f49ca5f52}. These bonuses stack, but half of the stacks (rounded up) are lost at the end of the target's turn.

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицер{/g} применяет {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, делая целью союзника, союзник получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}, равные {uip|StatBonus|27b71e5bb62a4bf1ad94359f49ca5f52}. Эффект суммируется, но половина прибавки (с округлением вверх) пропадает по завершении хода цели.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on an ally, that ally gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} equal to {uip|StatBonus|27b71e5bb62a4bf1ad94359f49ca5f52}. These bonuses stack, but half of the stacks (rounded up) are lost at the end of the target's turn.

traits.locale_text: Когда лидер применяет способность, делая целью союзника, союзник получает бонусы к Восприятию и Дальнему Бою, равные <u>бонус ОБЩ лидера</u>. Эффект суммируется, но половина прибавки (с округлением вверх) пропадает по завершении хода цели.

Когда лидер применяет способность, делая целью союзника, союзник получает бонусы к Восприятию и Дальнему Бою, равные <u>бонус ОБЩ лидера</u>. Эффект суммируется, но половина прибавки (с округлением вверх) пропадает по завершении хода цели.

Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицер{/g} применяет {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, делая целью союзника, союзник получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}, равные {uip|StatBonus|27b71e5bb62a4bf1ad94359f49ca5f52}. Эффект суммируется, но половина прибавки (с округлением вверх) пропадает по завершении хода цели.

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}对盟友使用{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}时，该盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}和{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}都会提高{uip|StatBonus|27b71e5bb62a4bf1ad94359f49ca5f52}点。此加成效果可以叠加，但当该盟友的回合结束时，加成效果会减弱一半（向上取整）。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on an ally, that ally gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} equal to {uip|StatBonus|27b71e5bb62a4bf1ad94359f49ca5f52}. These bonuses stack, but half of the stacks (rounded up) are lost at the end of the target's turn.

traits.locale_text: 每当领袖对盟友使用{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}时，该盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}和{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}都会获得{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，等同于<u>领袖的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}加值</u>。此加成效果可以叠加，但当该盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，加成效果会减弱一半（向上取整）。

每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}对盟友使用{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}时，该盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}和{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}都会提高{uip|StatBonus|27b71e5bb62a4bf1ad94359f49ca5f52}点。此加成效果可以叠加，但当该盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，加成效果会减弱一半（向上取整）。

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g} use una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} sobre un aliado, ese aliado recibe una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} igual a {uip|StatBonus|27b71e5bb62a4bf1ad94359f49ca5f52}. Estas bonificaciones son acumulativas, pero la mitad de estas acumulaciones (redondeando hacia arriba) se pierden al final del turno del objetivo.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on an ally, that ally gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} equal to {uip|StatBonus|27b71e5bb62a4bf1ad94359f49ca5f52}. These bonuses stack, but half of the stacks (rounded up) are lost at the end of the target's turn.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el oficial use una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} sobre un aliado, ese aliado recibe una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} igual a {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}. Estas bonificaciones son acumulativas, pero la mitad de estas acumulaciones (redondeando hacia arriba) se pierden al final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del objetivo.

Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g} use una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} sobre un aliado, ese aliado recibe una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} igual a {uip|StatBonus|27b71e5bb62a4bf1ad94359f49ca5f52}. Estas bonificaciones son acumulativas, pero la mitad de estas acumulaciones (redondeando hacia arriba) se pierden al final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del objetivo.

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offizier{/g} eine {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} bei einem Verbündeten einsetzt, erhält dieser Verbündete einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} in Höhe von {uip|StatBonus|27b71e5bb62a4bf1ad94359f49ca5f52}. Diese Boni sind stapelbar, aber die Hälfte der Stapel (aufgerundet) geht am Ende des Zuges des Ziels verloren.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on an ally, that ally gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} equal to {uip|StatBonus|27b71e5bb62a4bf1ad94359f49ca5f52}. These bonuses stack, but half of the stacks (rounded up) are lost at the end of the target's turn.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Offizier eine {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} bei einem Verbündeten einsetzt, erhält dieser Verbündete einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g} in Höhe von {unit_stat|WarhammerFellowship|bonus}. Diese Boni sind stapelbar, aber die Hälfte der Stapel (aufgerundet) geht am Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Ziels verloren.

Immer wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offizier{/g} eine {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} bei einem Verbündeten einsetzt, erhält dieser Verbündete einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g} in Höhe von {uip|StatBonus|27b71e5bb62a4bf1ad94359f49ca5f52}. Diese Boni sind stapelbar, aber die Hälfte der Stapel (aufgerundet) geht am Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Ziels verloren.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g} utilise une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} sur un allié, ce dernier reçoit un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} égal à {uip|StatBonus|27b71e5bb62a4bf1ad94359f49ca5f52}. Ces bonus sont cumulables, mais la moitié (valeur arrondie au nombre entier supérieur) est perdue à la fin du tour de la cible.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on an ally, that ally gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} equal to {uip|StatBonus|27b71e5bb62a4bf1ad94359f49ca5f52}. These bonuses stack, but half of the stacks (rounded up) are lost at the end of the target's turn.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g} utilise une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} sur un allié, ce dernier reçoit un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} égal à {uip|StatBonus|27b71e5bb62a4bf1ad94359f49ca5f52}. Ces bonus sont cumulables, mais la moitié (valeur arrondie au nombre entier supérieur) est perdue à la fin du tour de la cible.

Chaque fois que l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officier{/g} utilise une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} sur un allié, cet allié reçoit un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de Tir{/g} égal à {uip|StatBonus|27b71e5bb62a4bf1ad94359f49ca5f52}. Ces bonus sont cumulables, mais la moitié (valeur arrondie au nombre entier supérieur) est perdue à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de la cible.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}士官{/g}が味方に{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用した時、その味方は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g}に、{uip|StatBonus|27b71e5bb62a4bf1ad94359f49ca5f52}に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。このボーナスはスタックするが、ターゲットのターン終了時にスタック数の半分（切り上げ）を失う。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on an ally, that ally gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} equal to {uip|StatBonus|27b71e5bb62a4bf1ad94359f49ca5f52}. These bonuses stack, but half of the stacks (rounded up) are lost at the end of the target's turn.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}士官{/g}が味方に{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用した時、その味方は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g}に、{uip|StatBonus|27b71e5bb62a4bf1ad94359f49ca5f52}に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。このボーナスはスタックするが、ターゲットのターン終了時にスタック数の半分（切り上げ）を失う。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}オフィサー{/g}が味方に{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用した時、その味方は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道スキル{/g}に、{uip|StatBonus|27b71e5bb62a4bf1ad94359f49ca5f52}に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。このボーナスは累積するが、ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時に累積数の半分（切り上げ）を失う。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Subay{/g}, bir dost birim üzerinde {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} kullandığında o dost birim, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} niteliklerine {uip|StatBonus|27b71e5bb62a4bf1ad94359f49ca5f52} kadar {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} kazanır. Bu bonuslar üst üste birikse de birikimin yarısı hedefin turunun sonunda kaybolur (yukarı yuvarlanır).
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on an ally, that ally gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} equal to {uip|StatBonus|27b71e5bb62a4bf1ad94359f49ca5f52}. These bonuses stack, but half of the stacks (rounded up) are lost at the end of the target's turn.
